main event: Two airport control tower men observed a silvery, moon-sized flying object above Yakima, Washington, on July 25, 1948.
interesting points: The object was described as a 'silvery, moon-sized, flying-silob-shaped-thing',Hundreds of calls were made to the Civil Aeronautics Administration from witnesses,The object was seen twice, first at 2 p.m. and again at 4:20 p.m., The airport traffic controller stated he had never seen anything like it before, The object was determined not to be a plane, weather balloon, or other known aircraft.
